titles.title: Sanctioning Hizballah's Illicit Use of Civilians as Defenseless Shields Act
Sanctioning Hizballah’s Illicit Use of Civilians as Defenseless Shields Act

To impose sanctions on foreign persons that are responsible for gross violations of internationally recognized human rights by reason of the use by Hizballah of civilians as human shields, and for other purposes.
Sanctioning Hizballah's Illicit Use of Civilians as Defenseless Shields Act

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
